channel.title: Server on linux?
channel.description: hi all, im currently close to maybe getting a rs server to work on linux, it worked str8 from windows all i changed was the compile.bat and run.bat, converted to .sh's and changed paths, etc, but no errors when compiled, however when i run it, i get this: [code] slick@slick-desktop:~/Desktop/perfectbackup/perfectbase$ ./runserver.sh Loading... /home/slick/Desktop/perfectbackup/perfectbase/config/npc.cfg: file not found. /npcdrops.cfg: file not found. NPCEmotes.cfg was not found. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at NpcAnimHandler.loadanim(NpcAnimHandler.java:6) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1107) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:412) at server.main(server.java:95) [/code] and i am able to login but black screen, and disconnect but it keeps reconnecting if this helps any, any help at all is wanted![br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2009, 09:11:30 am[/size][hr]here is my run.sh code if it helps [code] /home/slick/Desktop/jdk1.6.0_11/bin/java -Xmx512M server [/code] and my compile.sh file too if it helps: [code] /home/slick/Desktop/jdk1.6.0_11/bin/javac -cp . *.java [/code] note: i went from vista windows to ubuntu linux

item.title: Server on linux?
item.dc:creator: @slickazzshooter slickazzshooter
item.description:
@slickazzshooter wrote:

hi all, im currently close to maybe getting a rs server to work on linux, it worked str8 from windows all i changed was the compile.bat and run.bat, converted to .shâ€™s and changed paths, etc, but no errors when compiled, however when i run it, i get this:

slick@slick-desktop:~/Desktop/perfectbackup/perfectbase$ ./runserver.sh
Loading... /home/slick/Desktop/perfectbackup/perfectbase/config/npc.cfg: file not found.
/npcdrops.cfg: file not found.
NPCEmotes.cfg was not found.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at NpcAnimHandler.loadanim(NpcAnimHandler.java:6)
        at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1107)
        at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:412)
        at server.main(server.java:95)

and i am able to login but black screen, and disconnect but it keeps reconnecting if this helps any, any help at all is wanted![br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2009, 09:11:30 am[/size][hr]here is my run.sh code if it helps

/home/slick/Desktop/jdk1.6.0_11/bin/java -Xmx512M server

and my compile.sh file too if it helps:

/home/slick/Desktop/jdk1.6.0_11/bin/javac -cp . *.java

note: i went from vista windows to ubuntu linux

Read full topic
